summary.para: Appends an element to the list of children. If the element already has a parent, it is removed from this parent as part of the append operation.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if this element cannot accept children of the type of newChild. Returns an error if the newChild is an ancestor of this element.

summary.para: Creates an element from a tag name. The element is appended to the list of children.

param.name: tagName
param.para: The tag name of the new child. An empty string is interpreted to be a text content element.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if this element cannot accept children of the specified type.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a string.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT

This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified string type. Returns an error if the attribute is not specified.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a extend mode value. This method can be used to get the value of a spreadMethod attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a fill mode. This method can be used to get the value of the fill-rule or clip-rule properties.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a matrix value. This method can be used to get the value of a transform or gradientTransform attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a POD type.

param.name: type
param.para: The POD type of the value.

param.name: valueSizeInBytes
param.para: The size of the value in bytes.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT

This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute is not specified. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified POD type.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a string.

param.name: valueCount
param.para: The number of elements in the returned value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT

This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified string type. Returns an error if the attribute is not specified.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a display value. This method can be used to get the value of the display property.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a length value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a line cap value. This method can be used to get the value of the stroke-linecap property.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a line join value. This method can be used to get the value of the stroke-linejoin property.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as an overflow value. This method can be used to get the value of the overflow property.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a preserve aspect ratio value. This method can be used to get the value of a preserveAspectRatio attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a unit type value. This method can be used to get the value of a gradientUnits or clipPathUnits attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a visibility value. This method can be used to get the value of the visibility property.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a float.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a paint. This method can be used to get the value of the fill or stroke properties.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as path data. This method can be used to get the value of the d attribute on a path element.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as points. This method can be used to get the value of the points attribute on a polygon or polyline element.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a stroke dash array. This method can be used to get the value of the stroke-dasharray property.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as an interface type.

param.name: riid
param.para: The interface ID of the attribute value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT

This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute is not specified. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified interface type.

summary.para: Gets the string length of an attribute of this element.

param.name: type
param.para: The string type of the attribute.

param.name: valueLength
param.para: The length of the attribute. The returned string length does not include room for the null terminator.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT

This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute is not specified. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified string type.

summary.para: Gets the document that contains this element.

param.name: document
param.para: Outputs the document that contains this element. This argument will be null if the element has been removed from the tree.

summary.para: Gets the first child of this element.

param.name: child
param.para: Outputs the first child of this element.

summary.para: Gets the last child of this element.

param.name: child
param.para: Outputs the last child of this element.

summary.para: Gets the next sibling of the referenceChild element.

param.name: referenceChild
param.para: The referenceChild must be an immediate child of this element.

param.name: nextChild
param.para: The output nextChild element will be non-null if the referenceChild has a next sibling. If the referenceChild is the last child, the output is null.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the parent element.
Gets the previous sibling of the referenceChild element.

param.name: referenceChild
param.para: The referenceChild must be an immediate child of this element.

param.name: previousChild
param.para: The output previousChild element will be non-null if the referenceChild has a previous sibling. If the referenceChild is the first child, the output is null.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Returns the number of specified attributes on this element. Attributes are only considered specified if they are explicitly set on the element or present within an inline style. Properties that receive their value through CSS inheritance are not considered specified. An attribute can become specified if it is set through a method call. It can become unspecified if it is removed via .

returns.para: Type: UINT32
Returns the number of specified attributes on this element.

summary.para: Gets the name of the attribute at the given index.

param.name: name
param.para: Outputs the name of the attribute.

param.name: nameCount
param.para: Length of the string returned in the name argument.

param.name: inherited
param.para: Outputs whether the attribute is set to the inherit value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the string length of the name of the specified attribute at the given index. The output string length does not include room for the null terminator.

param.name: nameLength
param.para: Outputs the string length of the name of the specified attribute.

param.name: inherited
param.para: Indicates whether the attribute is set to the inherit value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the tag name.

param.name: nameCount
param.para: Length of the value in the name argument.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the string length of the tag name.

returns.para: Type: UINT32
Returns the string length of the tag name. The returned string length does not include room for the null terminator.

summary.para: Gets the value of a text content element.

param.name: name
param.para: The value of the text content element.

param.name: nameCount
param.para: The length of the value in the name argument.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the length of the text content value.

returns.para: Type: UINT32
Returns the length of the text content value. The returned string length does not include room for the null terminator.

summary.para: Returns a boolean indicating whether this element has children.

returns.para: Type: BOOL
Returns TRUE if this element has children.

summary.para: Inserts newChild as a child of this element, before the referenceChild element. If the newChild element already has a parent, it is removed from this parent as part of the insertion.

param.name: referenceChild
param.para: The element that the child should be inserted before. If referenceChild is null, the newChild is placed as the last child. If referenceChild is non-null, it must be an immediate child of this element.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if this element cannot accept children of the type of newChild. Returns an error if the newChild is an ancestor of this element.

summary.para: Returns a boolean indicating if the attribute is explicitly set on the element.

param.name: inherited
param.para: Outputs whether the attribute is set to the inherit value.

returns.para: Type: BOOL
TReturns true if the attribute is explicitly set on the element or if it is present within an inline style. Returns FALSE if the attribute is not a valid attribute on this element.

summary.para: Returns a boolean indicating whether this element represents text content.

returns.para: Type: BOOL
Returns TRUE if this element represents text content, e.g. the content of a 'title' or 'desc' element. Text content does not have a tag name.

summary.para: Removes the attribute from this element. Also removes this attribute from within an inline style if present.

param.name: name
param.para: The name of the attribute to remove.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element.

summary.para: Removes the oldChild from the tree. Children of oldChild remain children of oldChild.

param.name: oldChild
param.para: The child element to be removed. The oldChild element must be an immediate child of this element.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Replaces the oldChild element with the newChild. This operation removes the oldChild from the tree. If the newChild element already has a parent, it is removed from this parent as part of the replace operation.

param.name: oldChild
param.para: The child element to be replaced. The oldChild element must be an immediate child of this element.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if this element cannot accept children of the type of newChild. Returns an error if the newChild is an ancestor of this element.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element as a color.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element as a matrix value. This method can be used to set the value of a transform or gradientTransform attribute.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element as a length value.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element as a preserve aspect ratio value. This method can be used to set the value of a preserveAspectRatio attribute.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element as an extend mode value. This method can be used to set the value of a spreadMethod attribute.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element as a fill mode. This method can be used to set the value of the 'fill-rule' or 'clip-rule' properties.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element using a POD type.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: type
param.para: The POD type of the attribute.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

param.name: valueSizeInBytes
param.para: The size of the new value in bytes.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified type.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element using a string.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified type.

summary.para: Gets an attribute of this element as a display value. This method can be used to get the value of the display property.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element as a line cap value. This method can be used to set the value of the stroke-linecap property.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element as a line join value. This method can be used to set the value of the stroke-linejoin property.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element as an overflow value. This method can be used to set the value of the overflow property.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element as a unit type value. This method can be used to set the value of a gradientUnits or clipPathUnits attribute.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element as a visibility value. This method can be used to set the value of the visibility property.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element using a float.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets an attribute of this element using an interface.
A given attribute object may only be set on one element in one attribute location at a time.

param.name: name
param.para: Name of the attribute to set.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the attribute.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT

This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. Returns an error if the attribute name is not valid on this element. Returns an error if the attribute cannot be expressed as the specified interface type. Returns an error if the attribute object is already set on an element.

summary.para: Sets the value of a text content element.

param.name: name
param.para: The new value of the text content element.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Interface for all SVG elements.
